text: adaralli spaṣṭavāda dr̥ṣṭāntagaḷive. Ibrāhīmara sthānavide. Adaroḷage pravēśisidavanu surakṣitanādanu. Allāhana meccugegāgi ī bhavanada hajj (yātre) māḍuvudu, (illige) prayāṇisaballa janara kartavyavāgide. Idannu dhikkarisuvavanu (tiḷidirali) – khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanu sarvalōkagaḷinda nirapēkṣanāgiddāne
